Name: Carrol Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered pickled walnut or onion.
Garnish with skewered pickled walnut or onion.
Review: Basically a Brandy Manhattan without bitters. Spirit-forward and dry yet easy.
History: A pre-Prohibition era cocktail published in the 1923 book "Harry" of Ciro's ABC of Mixing Cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of Carrol Cocktail contains 181 calories
